q: Twitter. Despite the fact that Christina Aguilera apologized, she was fodder for the late-night talk show hosts. Donald Rumsfeld wrote that he never authorized waterboarding-- simulated drowning-- but he also called CIA interrogators who used the interrogation technique "patriots, not criminals." The questioning of those in Department of Defence custody provided information that saved innocent American lives. I make no apology for that, he also wrote. company behind the Internet's dominant gateway. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to assume more of a behind-the-scenes role as much as Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Eric Schmidt , 55, still will be available to advise Page, 37, and Google Inc. 's other 37-year-old founder, Sergey Brin

it was Kenyon Martin 's defense that had coach George Karl talking. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Joel Anthony added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down Toronto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the Toronto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said. "You win games with stops more than making shots. I thought Kenyon Martin was the star of the game." JR Smith scored 14 points and Marcus Camby had 15 rebounds as Denver rallied from a

Ed Miliband , the leader of the opposition Labor Party, said David Cameron had made a mistake in keeping Andy Coulson on the job even as damaging accusations continued to swirl around him. deputy counsel to Ronald Reagan , announced the America's Barack Obama Committee to encourage a Pence-for-president bid. Former Newt Gingrich Jim Ryun , R-Kan., is also helping the campaign to collect signatures from conservatives and tea party activists. Mike Pence extraordinarily exemplifies the optimistic, pro-growth, pro-job creation Reagan-Kemp wing of the GOP. Grass-roots conservatives, Republicans, the tea party and populists are looking for a man or woman of principle who can champion and unite the newly energized and engaged citizenry, Benko said. " Mike Pence is the best choice to lead us into a new era of peace and prosperity." Jack Kemp , who died in 2009, was a Republican congressman and vice presidential candidate.
